short_summary: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify.  Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
description: This is the Phase 2 solicitation following an Invitation to Qualify.  Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Phase II F1700-220527

## Invitation to Qualify: Non-residential Building Construction Services

**Notice Number:** WS3745029987-Doc3790687103

**Publication Date:** December 14, 2022
**Closing Date:** January 19, 2023, 14:00 (ET)

**Solicitation Number:** WS3745029987

## Contract Description:

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit bids for the Phase II of the F1700-220527, Snootli Creek Hatchery Welcome Centre construction project. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.

## Contract Details

* **Contract Period:** January 31, 2023 - March 31, 2023
* **Location:** Snootli Creek Hatchery, Canada
* **Project Description:** The Snootli Creek Hatchery Welcome Centre is a building construction project that requires non-residential building construction services.
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Contracting Entity

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* **Contact Information:**
	+ **Name:** Wong, Summer (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ **Email:** [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Important Dates

* **January 31, 2023:** Expected contract start date
* **March 31, 2023:** Expected contract end date

## Trade Agreement:

This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Suppliers must be approved in the purchasing system prior to the closing date specified in this notice. Suppliers are required to be bilingual (English and French).

__** Legends **__
* Covenant of non-disclosure may be required of bidders and/or their representatives
* Supporting legislation or regulation may need to be applicable.  Please contact the Contracting Officer for specific information.
* Tender document only available electronically in English and French.
